Package network

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Database
  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all the necessary information to link Players, colors, tokens and Networks.

        public Player getUserByToken​(java.lang.String token)
        Returns:
        Returns the Player bound to the player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the token does not exists, an Exception is thrown

      • getNetworkByToken

        public ServerInterface getNetworkByToken​(java.lang.String token)
        Returns:
        Returns the NetworkInterface bound to the player
        Throws:

      • getControllerByToken

        public SlaveController getControllerByToken​(java.lang.String token)

      • login

        public java.lang.String login​(ServerInterface network,
                              boolean isrmi,
                              java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              java.lang.String color)
                       throws InvalidLoginException
        This method associates the connection with the player. If the username and the color are not used by other players it generates an unique token and a new user.
        Parameters:
        network - The Interface that must be used to send messages to the Client
        username - The name whom he wants to be called
        password - A user-set password used for reconnection
        color - The color whom he wants to be associated with
        Returns:
        The token associated with the user
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException - If username and/or color are already used, this Exception is thrown

      • login

        public java.lang.String login​(ServerInterface network,
                              boolean isrmi,
                              java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws InvalidLoginException
        This method is used to reconnect a player that left before
        Parameters:
        network - The Interface that must be used to send messages to the Client
        username - The name whom he wants to be called
        password - A user-set password used to check the identity of the Client
        Returns:
        The token used by the Client before the disconnection. An empty string is returned in case of errors.
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginException

      • logout

        public void logout​(java.lang.String token)
        This method logs the client out. It does not free Username and Color, so the Client can reconnect later using the same token.
        Parameters:
        token - The token of the caller.

      • logout

        public void logout​(ServerInterface serverInterface)
        Same as logout(String)
        Parameters:
        serverInterface - The interface of the caller

        public java.lang.String gameMaster()

        Returns:
        a Set containing all the tokens connected to the game

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.Collection<Player> getPlayers()
        Returns:
        a Collection containing all the Player that logged in

      • getSlaveControllers
